about_the_game:
Wield the Power of Medieval Mechs

Inhabit your mech and face off against unending waves of monstrous enemies on a forsaken, otherworldly planet.

Design Your Path to Dominance

Each run challenges you to strategize and adapt. Customize your mech with unique upgrades, creating powerful builds that change the course of every deadly mission.

Unlock the Dark Arsenal

Unlock an array of mechs, each with their own weapon loadouts. Embrace the destructive power of your arsenal and tailor your combat style to crush your adversaries.

Haunting Atmosphere

Immerse yourself in a 3D VR landscape where dark fantasy and surreal horrors come to life. From forgotten planets to demonic planes, every environment is a testament to the game's bleak and atmospheric design.

Features:

  • Bullet Hell Chaos: Navigate swarms of enemies that bombard you with waves of deadly attacks.
  • Character Customization: Shape your mech’s abilities and appearance to suit your quest.
  • Bullet Time: Manipulate time to evade death and unleash devastating counterattacks.
  • Dark and Atmospheric Themes: Confront demons, experience surreal and gothic environments, and embrace the dark fantasy setting.
